name: restlet
description: RESTful web API framework for JavaScript
author: Thierry Templier <templth@yahoo.fr>

scripts.doc:generate:server: cat lib/server.js lib/server-utils.js > docs/code-server.js ; node_modules/dox/bin/dox -r < docs/code-server.js > docs/doc-server.json ; node docs/generate-reference-server-doc.js ; node node_modules/doctoc/doctoc.js docs/references/doc-server-0.4.1.md
scripts.doc:generate:client: cat lib/client.js lib/client-utils.js > docs/code-client.js ; node_modules/dox/bin/dox -r < docs/code-client.js > docs/doc-server.json ; node docs/generate-reference-client-doc.js ; node node_modules/doctoc/doctoc.js docs/references/doc-client-0.4.1.md
scripts.test:ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --report lcovonly --require test/support/env --reporter spec test/server --check-leaks test/ test/server/
scripts.test:cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/ test/server/
